duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical safety and health support to mining maintenance and operations, and prepare written environmental, safety, and health programs.
Support the implementation and maintenance of ISO 45001 system and updates Safety Management System / 14001, as well as identify company safety training needs and develop training programs.
Participate in process reviews and support mine personnel in the selection of appropriate personal protective equipment.
Maintain corporate and local safety library, assist in the implementation of a hazard communication program, and demonstrate leadership in EHS through personal behaviors and conversations.

education_certification.credential: BS Degree in Occupational Safety & Health preferred or equivalent experience and education.
3-5 years’ experience in mining, preferably in a health and safety role
